thread.title: Corrie birth emergency, tragedy and return 10 big spoilers and episode guide | Metro News
thread.title_full: Corrie birth emergency, tragedy and return 10 big spoilers and episode guide | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Corrie birth emergency, tragedy and return 10 big spoilers and episode guide | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 3:01 pm (Picture: ITV) 
The agony of mothers is an ongoing theme in Coronation Street in coming episodes as Leanne Tilsley endures a traumatic labour while trapped in a lift and a grieving Michelle Connor faces more heavy emotion as she scatters Ruari’s ashes and then meets Leanne’s newborn. 
Elsewhere, jailed mum Maria Connor is reunited with Liam and it’s clear how hard she is finding being separated from him. In other Corrie developments, Sarah Platt is horrified to find out that Bethany has a boyfriend that she may have slept with while Jenny Bradley is at her blackmailing best as she determines to get her own way. 
Here’s your big spoiler roundup: 10 Corrie spoilers Leanne goes into labour while trapped in a lift with Toyah, who tries her best to help her sister through it. Michelle and Steve head to the coast to scatter Ruairi’s ashes. Later, Michelle struggles as she meets baby Olly. Eva takes Liam to see Maria and he asks her if he can stay with Eva and Aidan while she is inside. Steve confronts Robert over Michelle trying to kiss him and tells him he hopes they can stay friends. Nick is gutted when Leanne tells him that it doesn’t feel right for him to be on Olly’s birth certificate. Bethany admits to Sarah that she stayed at her boyfriend’s and Sarah bans her from seeing him. Jenny is knocked back by Richard Drake but resorts to blackmail after spotting a picture of him with his hand on his PA’s bottom. Cathy and Brian grow closer and Yasmeen comments on the spark between them. Aidan grows suspicious of Jenny’s action but she soon hits back. Craig is annoyed when Liam lets Darryl the rat escape from his cage. Monday 20th February Part One 
Toyah and Leanne end up trapped in a lift and, as they row over what Leanne said about Toyah not being a mum, Leanne’s waters break. meanwhile, Peter persuades Ken to give him a loan for his and Toyah;s fertility treatment. (Picture: ITV) 
Steve speaks with Robert over the kiss he almost shared with Michelle and tells him that Michelle regrets it. Later, Steve and Michelle head to the seaside and emotions run high as they scatter Ruairi’s ashes. 
Bethany lies to Sarah over where she spent the night but Sarah soon discovers the truth from Rana and Kate. Brian assures Roy he will look for somewhere else to live and Craig is irked when Liam lets Darryl escape. Monday 20th February Part Two (Picture: ITV) 
Rana shouts instructions up to the lift as Leanne goes into labour and Toyah stays by her sister’s side as she gives birth. Will the new life on the Street lead to a reconciliation between the warring siblings? 
Sarah confronts Bethany, who comes clean about having a new boyfriend but denies that she had sex with him. As they row, Sarah bans Bethany from seeing him but will Bethany defy her? 
Brian prepares a meal for Roy to try and make amends. Wednesday 22nd February (Picture: ITV) 
Michelle insists that she is genuinely pleased for Leanne but she struggles enormously when she meets baby Olly. Meanwhile, Nick is devastated when Leanne tells him it doesn’t feel right to name him as the father on the birth certificate. 
Aidan returns from abroad and is annoyed to find Jenny in the office, boasting about the order Richard Drake has placed. Liam is desperate to visit Maria. Friday 24th February Part One (Picture: ITV) 
After some bad news from Richard Drake, Jenny remains determined and spires an opportunity after spotting a photograph which shows him with his hand on his PA’s bottom. As she prints off the picture, she forms a plan. 
Michelle tells Steve she’d like to try for another baby. Gail organises a party in the bistro for baby Olly’s arrival and Michelle and Steve watch in pain from another table. 
Eva takes Liam to visit Maria. Yasmeen comments to Cathy that there are sparks between her and Brian. Friday 24th February Part Two (Picture: ITV) 
Aidan discovers the photo of Richard Drake and realises what Jenny is up to. After confronting her, he has another chock in store when Eva reveals that Liam is coming to stay with them. 
Cathy joins Brian for a drink in the Rovers while Steve and Michelle struggle to mask their conflicting emotions as baby Olly’s party continues. Metro Blogs is a place for opinions. These opinions belong to the author and are not necessarily shared by Metro. More
